content:
# The harvesting operation was successful, and I now have 10 iron ore in my inventory, along with 5 coal and 1 transport belt. This will allow me to continue smelting iron plates in the furnace.
# 
# Now, I can insert the newly harvested iron ore into the furnace to keep the production line running.

# Inserting the 10 iron ore into the furnace for smelting.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Inserting the 10 iron ore into the furnace.
print(f"Inventory updated to {inspect_inventory()}")  # Displaying updated inventory after insertion.
